.country-selection-banner{position:relative;width:100%;overflow:hidden;background:#fafdff;border-bottom:1px solid #ccdfef}.country-selection-banner__content{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin:12px 16px}@media (min-width:768px){.country-selection-banner__content{flex-wrap:nowrap;margin:0}}.country-selection-banner__copy{width:100%;max-width:none;margin:auto;padding:0 16px 0 0;font-size:1rem}@media (min-width:768px){.country-selection-banner__copy{width:auto;max-width:calc(100% - 375px);margin:auto 0;font-family:Franklin-Gothic-URW,helvetica,arial,sans-serif}}.country-selection-banner__copy&gt;*{margin:0;color:#062942;font-size:1rem;font-family:Franklin-Gothic-URW,helvetica,arial,sans-serif}.country-selection-banner__copy .flag-icon{max-width:20px}.country-selection-banner__inputs{display:inline-flex;width:100%;margin:10px auto 0}@media (min-width:768px){.country-selection-banner__inputs{width:auto;margin:auto 25px auto 10px}}.country-selection-banner__select{width:auto;margin:auto}@media (min-width:768px){.country-selection-banner__select{max-width:205px}}@media (min-width:1024px){.country-selection-banner__select{max-width:none}}.country-selection-banner__select select.form-control{border:2px solid #8495a2}.country-selection-banner__select .flag-icon{width:32px;max-width:30px;height:24px;margin:0 4px;line-height:1.6;background-size:100%}.country-selection-banner__close{position:absolute;top:5px;right:4px;padding:11px;-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;appearance:none}@media (min-width:768px){.country-selection-banner__close{position:relative;top:auto;right:auto}}.country-selection-banner__close span{font-size:1.6rem;line-height:0}@media (min-width:768px){.country-selection-banner__close span{line-height:normal}}.country-selection-banner__close-icon{height:12px;cursor:pointer;opacity:.5}
